title: Choose Our Future
desc: A static web application developed as part of my senior capstone. Over the course of a year, I worked with 5 other computer science students and a project sponsor.

title: History Through Battleship
desc: A full stack application developed for one of my courses at CU Boulder. I worked alongside 4 other students over the course of a semester to create a triva based battleship game.

title: Endless Picross
desc: An android game that generates random picross puzzles. Built for a mobile app development course at CU Boulder using Kotlin and Android Studio.

title: Triadic Color Generator
desc: An iOS app to calculate a triadic color palette from a single hex or rgb input. Built for a mobile app development course at CU Boulder using Swift and Xcode.
